3441          {
3442              $banlength = $bantimes[$banned['bantime']];
3443              $remaining = $banned['remaining'];
3444  
3445              $timeremaining = nice_time($remaining, array('short' => 1, 'seconds' => false))."";
3446  
3447              if($remaining <= 0)
3448              {
3449                  $timeremaining = "<span style=\"color: red;\">({$lang->ban_ending_imminently})</span>";
3450              }
3451              else if($remaining < 3600)
3452              {
3453                  $timeremaining = "<span style=\"color: red;\">({$timeremaining} {$lang->ban_remaining})</span>";
3454              }
3455              else if($remaining < 86400)
3456              {
3457                  $timeremaining = "<span style=\"color: maroon;\">({$timeremaining} {$lang->ban_remaining})</span>";
3458              }
3459              else if($remaining < 604800)
3460              {
3461                  $timeremaining = "<span style=\"color: green;\">({$timeremaining} {$lang->ban_remaining})</span>";
3462              }
3463              else
3464              {
3465                  $timeremaining = "({$timeremaining} {$lang->ban_remaining})";
3466              }
3467          }
3468  
3469          eval("\$bannedusers .= \"".$templates->get("modcp_banning_ban")."\";");
3470      }
3471  
3472      if(!$bannedusers)
3473      {
3474          eval("\$bannedusers = \"".$templates->get("modcp_banning_nobanned")."\";");
3475      }
3476  
3477      $modnotes = $cache->read("modnotes");
3478      $modnotes = htmlspecialchars_uni($modnotes['modmessage']);
3479      
3480      $plugins->run_hooks("modcp_end");
3481  
3482      eval("\$modcp = \"".$templates->get("modcp")."\";");
3483      output_page($modcp);
3484  }
